text: Ihor Lytovka (; born 5 June 1988), is a Ukrainian football goalkeeper who plays for Desna Chernihiv. ==Career== === Sevastopol === In 2007 he moved to Sevastopol and he won the Ukrainian First League of the season one season and he got promoted to the Ukrainian Premier League. === Tavriya Simferopol (Loam) === He was on loan in Tavriya Simferopol in the Ukrainian Premier League, but not played for main squad. === Olimpik Donetsk === In 2014 he moved to Olimpik Donetsk, where he riched the semifinal of Ukrainian Cup in the season 2014–15. === Voluntari === In 2015, he played for Voluntari in Romania in Liga II and with the club he won the competition in the season 2014–15. === Voluntari === In 2016 he moved from FC Voluntari to Riga in Latvia where he got into the final of the Latvian Cup in the season 2016–17. === Desna Chernihiv === In winter transfer 2016–17, he has been released and he signed for Desna Chernihiv and he got promoted to Ukrainian Premier League in the season 2017–18 were he played 11 matches. In summer 2018, after the arrivial at the club of Yevhen Past, he become the second goalkeeper of the club of Chernihiv. On 30 October 2019 he played in Ukrainian Cup against MFC Mykolaiv where Desna Chernihiv won 4–2 away at the Tsentralnyi Miskyi Stadion. With the club of Chernihiv he also qualified for the Europa League third qualifying round where he played 5 matches in Ukrainian Premier League in the season 2019–20. On 15 August 2020 he extended his contract with Desna He played against Rukh Lviv in the first match of Desna of Ukrainian Cup in the season 2020–21, where the club won 2-1 and qualified for the Round 16 of the season 2020–21. On 4 October 2020 he played against Shakhtar Donetsk at the Chernihiv Stadium for the Ukrainian Premier League his first match in the season 2020–21. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {|
